channel.title: Wow..... weird thing
channel.description:
#### What happened? I got attacked, no proper explanation...... drunk isn't supposed to be immune, right?
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? i should've died due to that attack, or that message shouldn't have come.
#### Steps to reproduce: ![image|437x450](upload://fuvba3kgAuvC9Fz4uR7fRahGoBA.jpg) ![image|351x451](upload://msBjpeKIaXgSn6oagTKEG6tz9J9.jpg) ![image|346x500](upload://99iYABC4qgXc5GzE4dGVOM275wt.jpg) ![image|600x309](upload://ymeLcaLvDCS0ODXckxW00l7WPhi.jpg) https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/378906205088907265/378912757778612244/output_log.txt
#### Comments: So weird.

item.title: Wow..... weird thing
item.dc:creator: Vandalay
item.description:
Read the description of debauchery after the new update, it does not redirect the target, but everyone who visits the target that isn’t occupy immune, in short the drunk wasn’t attacked, 4 was attacked. the drunk is immune to any attacks or conversions that he redirects. (though do note, occupy immune roles are not redirected, so drunk does not stop MM from converting).

Read full topic

item.title: Wow..... weird thing
item.dc:creator: TryphonX
item.description:
Drunk is immune to redirected attacks iirc.

Read full topic
